titleInfo.title: Mid-Night Gospel Sing with Wally Fowler at the Hamilton High School

mods.abstract: One color window card (blue on white) announcing the Midnight Gospel Sing with Wally Fowler, Roy Carter and the Chucks, and the Johnson Sisters at the Hamilton High School on July 5.
